CustomField.formula: IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 1, 'January', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 2, 'February', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 3, 'March', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 4, 'April', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 5, 'May', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 6, 'June', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 7, 'July', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 8, 'August', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 9, 'September', IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 10, 'October',IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 11, 'November',IF( MONTH( Performance_Date__c ) = 12, 'December','') )))))))))))
CustomField.label: Month
